description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.SRkvq0GXYm3Wi6ze]{Spellbrawler}

You gain Mysticism as a class skill. As a standard action, you can conjure an @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.Nrf6oy9pJwcEmryP.JournalEntryPage.nXkFsyxk7Vybdn7G#analog]{Analog} weapon whose item level is no greater than your soldier level – 2 (minimum 1st level, [[max(1,-2+@classes.soldier.levels)]]). This weapon appears in your hand(s) fully loaded with the appropriate type of basic ammunition. The weapon and any remaining ammunition dissipate after 1 minute. Once you use this ability, you can’t use it again until you have regained Stamina Points following a 10-minute rest.

(You will need to manually edit the details of the Soldier class feature to add Mysticism as a class skill)
